content:
I built with the igPublisher an IG containing an example that sets a value for Resource.language, but has no narrative elements (e.g. Resource.text)
The validator gives the warning "Resource has a language, but the XHTML does not have a language tag".
I agree it should warn when narrative elements do not have a language tag.
Should it warn when there are no narrative elements at all?

In the files at https://github.com/AuDigitalHealth/ci-fhir-stu3/tree/master/output/SharedMedicinesList
is the Bundle resource https://github.com/AuDigitalHealth/ci-fhir-stu3/blob/master/output/SharedMedicinesList/Bundle-a37e43d2-393b-4953-8cdc-6e3b86c4ad9c.xml
and the qa file https://github.com/AuDigitalHealth/ci-fhir-stu3/blob/master/output/SharedMedicinesList/qa.html
Two warnings are
Bundle/a37e43d2-393b-4953-8cdc-6e3b86c4ad9c: Bundle.entry[6].resource
and
Bundle/a37e43d2-393b-4953-8cdc-6e3b86c4ad9c: Bundle.entry[13].resource
